title: Farm Clash 3D
description: A unique third-person shooter set in a colorful farm environment. Battle against other players using farm-themed weapons and characters in various game modes. Features team-based gameplay, multiple maps, and a lighthearted, humorous approach to the shooter genre.
how_to_play: Use WASD to move, Space to jump, and Shift to sprint. Mouse to aim and left-click to shoot. Press R to reload and Q/E to switch weapons. On mobile, use the virtual joystick and on-screen buttons. Work with your team to defeat the opposing team and complete objectives.
